Package no.hiof.webframework.application

Class ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.webframework.application.ServerHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestableServerHandler
public class ServerHandler extends Object
This class represents the server handler that handles the server requests and responses.
